title.narrative: Promoting lifelong learning fos sustainable and just societies in Latin America and the Caribbean

description.narrative: Within the framework of the 2030 Sustainable Development Agenda and of the E2030 Road Map for Latin America and the Caribbean, UNESCO will continue playing in the region its catalytic and coordination role in advancing the global literacy agenda, as specified in the United Nations Resolution on 'Literacy for life: shaping future agendas' (A/RES/69/141). In spite of an overall high youth and adult literacy rates, ranging well above 90%, LAC still faces important challenges. In collaboration with UIL and other partners in the region, the Office will support Member States to respond to sustainable development by enhancing their policy, planning and monitoring capacity to ensure an equitable access to quality literacy learning opportunities as a crucial foundation for lifelong learning.
